page.title: 07The Spa Ponds
page.content: During the last two years unemployed adults on one year training schemes have been working to improve the area of the Spa ponds which had become dirty and neglected. The ponds many years ago had been stocked with trout and carp,and were close to{Beeston Lodge,}a large old gatehouse which no longer exists. Two new ponds have been made with islands in the middle to attract wild life.Fifteen different kinds of dragonflies have come over from the nearby marshes,to the ponds.Trees have been planted,mainly oak and willow. Unfortunately the area is constantly being spoiled by{vandalism.}Trees have been uprooted and water iris have been removed to decorate people's own garden ponds.A pair of{swans}decided to nest there last year(1984) but were shot at by youths with pellet guns.
